summary: A group of ex-rough riders, an ex-prostitute and a gunfighter enter a horse race in the desert.
cast: Gene Hackman|Candice Bergen|James Coburn|Ben Johnson|Ian Bannen|Jan-Michael Vincent|Robert Donner|Jean Willes|Mario Arteaga|Dabney Coleman|John McLiam|Bob Hoy|Jerry Gatlin|Sally Kirkland|Walter Scott|William H. Burton Jr.|Buddy Van Horn|Joe Brooks|Lucia Canales|Darwin Lamb|Paul Stewart
title: Muerde la bala
